channel.title: I need help with posting with pics
channel.description: how do i pot pics into my post

item.title: I need help with posting with pics
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Go to Imageshack.us click browse, choose the file you want to host, then wait for it to upload after you hit upload, then scroll down where it says Direct Link to Image, copy that come to a post, Click the little picture icon in your posting options next to the flash button and hyperlink button above the smileys. and highlight the section you just pasted, and hit the picture icon to put [img] tags around it. then hit preview to make sure you did it right… For instance…

[img*]http:://www.thisisagenerichost.com/randomdir/dir/imageblah2.jpg[*/img] ((DON"T INCLUDE ASTERISKS))

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with posting with pics
